-e ---

# gunû gunû is an ubiquitous ligature sign modification adding four vertical or horizontal strokes:

𒍦 ⋍ 𒀾 ⋍ 𒑓 ⋍ 𒆦 ⋍ 𒍩 ⋍ gunû ⇔ 𒋗 šu 𒑕 𒑑 𒀼 𒈛 𒉣 ⇔ šešig tenu nutillu 𒈠

𒉣 nuĝ ≈ ĝun in gunu 𒁇𒉣 paragon = diagonal

e.g. 𒅆 => 𒅊

𒎙 'gunu' / 𒊺 ŠE-'gunu' => šešig 𒌨 => 𒌪

gunu especially in its form of 𒎙 𒊺 𒐑 may be related to 𒉆 NAM, phonetically as ablaut marker? 𒄊𒀴 šakan₆ حَاكِم ˢḥākim "governor" => 𒉆𒄊𒀴 NAM šakan₆ ≈ حُكْمِة ˢhukmah "governorship"

mesh gunu

In Proto-Cuneiform and in Elamite gunu was often realized as a mesh similar to
𒆜 kaskal
𜎤 𜎦 𜎧 in 𜓵 𜎯 𜎰
𜓅 𜐚 𜐕 𜐔 𜐖 𜐙 𜐘 𜒤
𜒥 𜑤 𜑦 𜑨 𜑥 𜑧?
𜓃 𜑆 𜑇 𜑈 𜑅
𜏘 𜐺
𜏠 𜎿 𜎽
𜏢 𜏀 𜎾
𜏡 𜏣 hal
𜏰 𜏁 𜏯 𜏒 𜏱 𜏲
𜓚 𜎶 𜎷

Identified variants of 𜏯 𜏱 𜏁 indicate that dots were (sometimes?) used as old gunu.

Not commonly counted as gunu forms:
𒅋 ≈ 𒌈 ≈ 𒀧 𒀧 IL ≈ 𒀠 AL ⋅ ŠE 𒊺 𒊺 ŠE 𒐑
𒉣 NUN 𒀸𒁹𒁹𒁹𒁹 GUNU in 𒍪 ⋍ 𒄑·𒉣 𒀿 𒃷 𒅁 𒆱 𒈲
𒌧 ≈ 𒌦·𒍦
𒂡 𒆟 𒁈
𒊓 𒂍 𒆍 𒁖 𒂊 𒂍 𒂎 𒂏 𒂐 𒂑 𒂒 𒂓
𒋗 šu ⇔ 𒁕 𒀉 𒆏 𒂆 𒆷 𒍠
𒈛
𒉠
𒂞 ŠEŠ4 ≈ 𒋁 ŠEŠ2 Susa
𒃽 GASHAN 𒌋 ù.gunu ⇔ 𒌋 ù ego
𒍠 𒋺 gunu ?
𒋫 ṭa => 𒊭 ša
𒌗 𒌘 𒌙 𒌚

gunû ≈ •khumu /khm/ ?

𓆎 ≈ 𜎦 in
𜎦𜑊𜐶 Menik malik “king” Menes NL
𜎦𜑊𜐶 ᵏMenik König “king”

GUNU like ligature in other systems:
𓇳 𔗑 𓐍 𓊖 ?
𔖻 𔑺:𔑾 𔑻:𔑿 𔓴:𔗾 𔔱:𔕄 𔖚:𔖛(oMEGA 𔖙)
𔖲𔖻 𔕺:𔕿 𔖢:𔗖 𔑦:𔑧 𔓷:𔗑 𔕷:𔕹 𔔠:𔔟:𔔞
𔖻 mi => 𔔥 目 ma- Maschen "scale"

GUNU in Egyptian is periferal and mostly only recognizable in the extended Gardiner list (needs font)

𒑏 𒑐 𒑑 𒑓

Semantic significance ? causative ?

Gunification = add gunu to sign to modify/intensify/derive meaning:

𒅆 IGI Auge eye
𒅊 IGI{GUNU} be bright, shine, see

𒃸 GAN tenu < 𒃷 GAN gunu < 𒃰 GAN

Sign | Root | Base | meaning
-|-|-|-
𒀕 | AB GUNU|𒀊| /unug/ Nagar 𒀔 «The City» eg 𒌷𒀕 Uruk 𒀕𒆠
𒀌 | AB × DUN3 GUNU|𒀊 𒂅
𒀐 | AB × IGI GUNU|𒀊 𒅆
𒀆 | A × LAGAR GUNU|𒀀 𒇬
𒁌 | BI × IGI GUNU|𒁉𒁊
𒁸| DIN KASKAL U-GUNU DISH|𒁷𒆜𒆦𒌋𒁹|
𒁼 | DU GUNU | 𒁺|source : root
𒂆 | DUN3 GUNU | 𒂅 | Don (prince)
𒂇 | DUN3 GUNU GUNU | 𒂆 | 1.crown 2.shekel?
𒂧 | EZEN × DUN3 GUNU |𒂡𒂆
𒂨 | EZEN × DUN3 GUNU GUNU |𒂡 𒂇
𒂪 | EZEN × HA GUNU |𒂡𒄫
𒂫 | EZEN × IGI GUNU |𒂡
𒂶 | GA GUNU | 𒂵| 𒃼 GAR carry 𒈦𒄘𒃼 Tiger? 𒂵𒃲
𒃖 | GA2 × IGI GUNU|𒂷𒅆 Gesehen?
𒄉 | GIR2 GUNU|𒄈|GirSu𓊖 KIŠI17𓊖 AD5 𒌑𒄉
𒄄 | GI GUNU 𒄀 𒄂 𒄃
𒄚 | GU2 × KAK × IGI GUNU|𒄘|Gurgel…?
𒄝 | GU2 GUNU|𒄘|Gurgel
𒄾 | HUL/LIK GUNU | 𒌨? | hull:cover
𒄫 | HA GUNU | 𒄩 | KIR 𒄫 cry 2. generate a lot
𒅊 | IGI GUNU | 𒅆 | be bright
𒅊 | IGI GUNU = SIG7 | 𒅆 | see,sehen,𐍃𐌰𐌹𐍈𐌰𐌽 ⇔ 𒋜
𒆖 | KAK × IGI GUNU|𒆕|
𒆱 | KUL GUNU |𒆰|
𒇋 | LAGAB × IGI GUNU| 𒆸𒅊𒅆
𒇯 | LAGAR GUNU| 𒇬|𒇰 𒆠𒇯 KI•LAGAN खलिहान khalihan 𒈢 | MA GUNU |𒈠| alma, mer, μῆλον mêlon, mazana : apple
𒈯 | MUG GUNU | 𒈮| MUNSUB ⇔ monk zadim; za-dim2 [128x] stone-cutter; bow-maker
𒈽 | MUSH3 GUNU | 𒄷|| 𓅓 Musen big bird
𒉲 | NUNUZ AB2 × IGI GUNU |𒉭𒀖𒅊
𒋜 | SI GUNU| 𒋛 | see,sehen,𐍃𐌰𐌹𐍈𐌰𐌽 ⇔ 𒅊 𒋛𒍦
𒎖 | SAG × IGI GUNU | 𒊕𒊔𒅆|seh?
𒊨 | SAG gunû | 𒊕𒊔 | sag: DUL3 𒊨 tell, KUŠ2 𒊨 quoth SUMUR 𒊨 summon SUR2
𒋯 | TA GUNU |𒋫𒋖|
𒋆 | ⋍TA gunu | SHIM / šim : smell
𒋍 | SHIM × IGI GUNU |Soma(⋍beer) 𒋆𒅊 ⇔ 𒋋
𒂊 | E ⋍ A-gunu 𒆦𒀀 | in old grapheme

𒋽 | TE GUNU |𒋼
𒌘 | UD × U PLUS U PLUS U GUNU
𒌙 | UD GUNU | 𒌓 | Mond=>Middle moon murub?
𒌧 | UN GUNU | 𒌦 | ane,on,one,me

Hypothesis: Ablaut?
𒌙 mouth
𒌘 month
𒌗 moon

Hypothesis: gunu ⋍ con 𓎛 𓈖 𓂝

Hypothesis: something 𒋗 يَد yad > إيد ʾīd ⇔ with & et 𒌋 add 𓂞 da-
𒄉 AD₂GÍR a dagger < 𒄈 GÍR GER 个 gèr

Hypothesis: Softening ?
𒊭 ša < tha < 𒋗 šu + TA 𒋫

Hypothesis: permutation
GUD 𒄞 ⇔ DUG 𒂁 reverse

Hypothesis: causative 𒋗 šu ?
𒅆 IGI Auge eye
𒅊 IGI{GUNU} be bright, shine, see
𒅊 SIG₇ = IGI-gunû : green (eye) 𒅆𒆦
𒁺 RE₆ > 𒁼 root => se'root 𒁼 šuršu (source) !
𒄈 GÍR => 𒄉 "grind" 𒄉 ul₄ ἀλέω aléō աղալ ałal "grind"

Hypothesis: 'S' modifier 𒀾 AŠ₂ 𒐺 ᵛáš
𒁺 RE₆ > 𒁼 se'root 𒁼 šuršu (source) !
𒂆 AGA₃ ax > 𒂇 AGAˢ āšĝar axe
𒈠 MA ⇔ 𒈢 ma.ḫinzūru manzar manzana mazá maçã "apple" 𒋛 SI => 𒋜 saʳ sor سرخ sorx “red” => 𓂧 cheir 𒋗 šu in 𓂧 𓈙 𓂋 𓅟 csar чер čer

Hypothesis: add round 'R' sound? gunûr grunû ergonû ?
𒂵 GAʳ > 𒂶 gara₂ gunu
𒂆 AGA₃ ax > 𒂇 AGAˢ / AGAʳ āšĝar axe
𒊔 saĝ 𒊕 => 𒊨 šur₂
𒄩 ḪA/KU => KIR 𒄫 cry <= 𒄩 KU/ḪA® Gunu Karpfen Coy 𓅻
𒅆 IGI => 𒅊 AGAR4 green (eye) 𒅆𒆦 (𒅊 IGI-gunû)
𒁺𒆦 => 𒁼 Saat => source
𒈠 MA ⇔ 𒈢 марь maŕ мар mar mer μῆλον mêlon mālum melon mollë alma "apple"
𒈠 MA ⇔ 𒈢 мурӯд murüd мыӏэрысэ məʼɛrəsɛ 𒄑𒈢𒈠𒁕 hašhurmada جَّاص ʔijjāṣ madra mazá 𒋛 SI => 𒋜 saʳ sor سرخ sorx “red” 𓂧 𓈙 𓂋 𓅟 dsar csar чер čer

for R Hypothesis see -er -ier verb suffix

Gunification may introduce an 's' or an 'r' in
𒂆 AGA₃ ax
𒂇 AGAˢ axe āšĝar

Hypothesis: Ⲡ ⲡ form 𓃀 𓍢 𓇩 ⋍ 𓊪 𓅮 𓄿 ⋍ Ⲡ ⲡ bu pi π form (rare!) 𒈠 MA ⇔ 𒈢 pōma ፖም pom pomme <> palm ball 𒅆 IGI 𒅊 πʳIGI bright 𒁺 RE₆/GIN > 𒁼 origin 𒁺 RE₆ 𒁼 boarne πηγή pigí part աղբյուր ałbyur πroot 𒂆 AGA₃ axe 𒂇 Beil

Hypothesis: article al- ⲡ- -on 𒈠 MA ⇔ 𒈢 alma / pōma "apple"
𒈠 MA ⇔ 𒈢 μῆλον mêlon "apple"

Hypothesis: -on -ant -end gerund 𒄈 GÍR => 𒄉 "grind"

Hypothesis: article 𓂧 de das 𒋗 šu 𒋛 SI => 𒋜 saʳ sor سرخ sorx “red” => 𓂧 𓈙 𓂋 𓅟 das Rot desarᵗ dsar csar чер čer

-ier ≈ ill in
𒄄 gi₄ˡˡ ki₂ˡˡ kill
𒄄 gi₄ᶻ ⇔ 𒄤 GAZ cuts "kill"

Unlikely: 't' modifier
𒂆 ax 𒂇 Axt
𒁺 RE₆ > 𒁼 root => se'root 𒁼 šuršu (source) !
𒁺 ĝire? => 𒁼 Sart seed => source (𒁺𒆦)

𒆦 ≠ 𒀾
𒀾 AŠ₂ AŠ2 ASH₂ ASH2
𒀾 > 𒐺 ᵛáš : wish

𒋫 ṭa 𒊭 ša
𒋫 Ta Taurus 𒊭 שׁוֹר šor Saurus

𒂈 ŠUDUN ≈ 𒋗𒁕 DAᵘᵐ ζυγόν zugón Zügeln

gunu as word

𒁯 gunuₓ (SI@g) <> 𒋜 su₄ 𒋠 sig₂ գյուղ gyuğⁿ 村 cūn #gunu "dwelling"
